name: test_e2e_with_logs[130_XSS_ADV_062]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_ADV_062` |
| **Name** | DOM insertAdjacentHTML |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | advanced |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend','<script>alert(1)</script>')`
- **Encoded**: `insertAdjacentHTML%28%27beforeend%27%2C%27%3Cscript%3Ealert%281%29%3C%2Fscript%3E%27%29`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~57000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:44:16.000 UTC

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX XSS] DOM-based XSS Attack test_id=XSS_ADV_062-1771076656895-3ffa9m pattern_id=XSS_ADV_062 uri=/?q=insertAdjacentHTML%28%27beforeend%27%2C%27%3Cscript%3Ealert%281%29%3C%2Fscript%3E%27%29 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
